Title: Before I Wake (Soul Screamers)
Author: রাচেল ভিনসেন্ট
Summary: Covering up her own murder was one thing but faking her life is much harder than ex-teen banshee Kaylee expected. Now she's fighting to stay visible to the human world and struggling to find time alone with her new reaper boyfriend Tod.
